content.text: I love modding hardware and creating things with 1-bit aesthetics. If it has a screen or a motor, I've probably tried to upgrade it.

items: *3D Printer:* Creality Ender 3 Pro (All-metal feeder, Glass bed)
*Arcade:* AtGames Legends Pinball (Sanwa buttons, VIBS board)
*Handhelds:* Playdate, Steam Deck OLED, Switch OLED

content.text: I design my 3D parts using *OpenSCAD* and slice them with *UltiMaker Cura*.
